actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the initial amount and the adjusted gross income limitation applicable to the credit for the elderly.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the retirement income credit for the elderly and the adjusted gross income limitation applicable to that credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the initial amount and the adjusted gross income limitation applicable to the credit for the elderly.
